What are the treatments for tarsal-carpal coalition syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of tarsal-carpal coalition syndrome:  - Foot Health Facts: Tarsal Coalition  - Genetic Testing Registry: Tarsal carpal coalition syndrome   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative Care,GHR,tarsal-
